name: MaYuanTalk
_source: s;Simon;Do you understand what we're doing?
s;Simon;I wish I was like you. A free bird.|You could leave right now, you know.
s;Simon;Not worry about Morrissey, or Pelopos, or Troy.
s;Simon;I've been thinking... what do I want?|I want to survive.|I want my friends to survive.|But beyond that, do I want to be a lord?|I am, I suppose.|Maybe that's all that matters.
